entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers late this morning and this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this morning and this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 this afternoon. High 27. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 11. POP 60%
